subject: Sleep
title: Lithium and Sleep
description: A short lesson to help you apply Lithium and Sleep.

hook.text: Lithium is the oldest mood stabilizer and one of the most effective. Part of its power comes from resetting sleep.

buildup.text: Lithium directly affects the molecular circadian clock by inhibiting the enzyme GSK-3Î².

discovery.text: By slowing the circadian clock, lithium strengthens and stabilizes the rhythms that bipolar disorder disrupts.

twist.text: Lithium also increases deep sleep and may enhance glymphatic clearance, providing neuroprotective benefits.

climax.text: Lithium's circadian effects may explain why it works for bipolar disorder and not for unipolar depression.

punchline.text: Lithium doesn't just stabilize mood. It stabilizes the body clock.

quiz.question: How does lithium affect the circadian system?
options: It speeds up the circadian clock
It inhibits GSK-3Î², slowing and stabilizing circadian rhythms
It has no effect on circadian rhythms
